about_the_game:
Bluebie VS the Army of Cyborgs is a Cartoony 3D platformer that will take you to the fictive world of planet Rebaga. The planet look pretty much like earth and the culture there is pretty similar to ours. One day, Cybex, a self made Cyborg, decided to invade the planet and turn its inhabitants into his servants.

Of course, Bluebie, a farmer, is not willing to see his planet enslaved by the army of Cybex and decided to fight back and free the prisoners Cybex took.

In his quest, Bluebie will travel through mines,  mountains, desert and different other places where the cyborgs settled and launched their operation. He will fight the generals of Dr Cybex to free as much prisoners as he can while developing and purchasing new skills thanks to his colorful closet plenty of different outfits.

Fight Enemies

A stick, a spear, a boomerang, a slingshot, a crossbow and a pigeon launcher. Which weapon to use to fight your enemies. Every weapon will have its own range and damage level. One is sometimes enough, two or more could be a necessity.

Release The  Prisoners

The army of Cybex has taken many people. The cages might be hidden allover the places. Try to free them all to get the biggest achievement of the game, an achievement to rule them all, The Freeyorator !!!

Change Your Outfit

You can choose your outfit in the main menu or within the game, all you need to do is to access a fitting room and choose the best fit of the moment !

Execute Missions

Every level will come with its own riddles, challenges and missions. Execute these missions to move forward.

Enjoy Your Rides

Whether it is to avoid enemies, moving faster or for fun , you will be able to ride animals.

There is also an aircraft level where you will have to fight enemy aircrafts and air defenses within a timeframe. A race against time, a race against the enemy.   

Get New Skills

Your experience points are collected by killing enemies. To unlock new skills, you will have to kill whatever enemy you find and collect diamonds to get the biggest ones so... you know what you got to do when you got to do it... 

Weapon Shops To Refill

You're short of projectiles or you want to acquire new skills, no problem, we got you! Every level will have at least two weapon shops to buy projectiles for your weapons, or to acquire new skills, thanks to the diamonds you collected previously. Just collect as much as you can, some items might be expensive.

short_description: A fun 3D Platformer where you will fight Cyborgs using different weapons and skills you will acquire. The game will take you to different places where you will have to find and release hidden prisoners and defeat Cybex. Will you save them all ?
